actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A resolution expressing the concern of the House of Representatives at the presence of Soviet combat forces in Cuba and urging the Senate to deny its advise and consent to the ratification of the proposed Strategic Arms Limitation Treaty while any Soviet combat troops remain in Cuba.

summary.text: Urges the Senate not to ratify the proposed SALT II Treaty while Soviet troops remain in Cuba.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the concern of the House of Representatives at the presence of Soviet combat forces in Cuba and urging the Senate to deny its advise and consent to the ratification of the proposed Strategic Arms Limitation Treaty while any Soviet combat troops remain in Cuba.
